mapper.insert: insert into channel ( c_name, sort, status, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{c_name}, #{sort}, #{status}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select id, c_name, sort, status, create_time, update_time from channel where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update channel set c_name=#{c_name}, sort=#{sort}, status=#{status}, update_time=now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, c_name, sort, status, create_time, update_time from channel order by sort asc
